Docs.summary: Entry point to virtual machine management API.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Capture (string groupName, string name, string containerName, string vhdPrefix, bool overwriteVhd);

abstract member Capture : string * string * string * string * bool -> string

Docs.param: Destination container name to store the captured VHD.
The prefix for the VHD holding captured image.
Whether to overwrites destination VHD if it exists.
Docs.summary: Captures the virtual machine by copying virtual hard disks of the VM and returns template as a JSON string that can be used to create similar VMs.
